caption:
This photograph depicts a busy urban construction site. The scene is crowded with a variety of heavy machinery, construction materials, and several vehicles, including trucks and vans, some marked with signs specific to utility companies. The construction area is bustling with workers engaged in various activities, some of whom are visible within the contained areas marked by temporary barricades. 

There appears to be significant traffic, with lanes of cars and trucks that blend into the background where leafless trees and city buildings line the street, indicating an urban setting. Various signs are scattered throughout the scene, including traffic direction signs like "KEEP RIGHT," and a sign that reads "PEDESTRIANS" pointing to a walkway amidst the chaos.

The image is rich in details showing a typical urban infrastructure project with a focus on the modification or expansion of roadways or utility systems. The overall composition suggests a lively and somewhat congested scene, highlighting the complexity and scale of urban construction projects.
title: Subway construction on Connecticut Avenue. (From the SITES exhibition. For other images in this assignment, see fiche numbers 69, 70, 71.)
